meanings.definition: A large collection of data organized for quick search and retrieval.
meanings.sent1: The databank at the library helps us find books easily.
meanings.sent2: I saved all my photos in a databank on my computer.
meanings.sent3: The databank of jokes made everyone laugh at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a databank, storing memories for easy access.
meanings.sent5: The databank of recipes in her kitchen made cooking a breeze.

meanings.definition: A repository of information stored in a computer system.
meanings.sent1: The company's databank contains all the sales records.
meanings.sent2: I need to update the databank with the latest research findings.
meanings.sent3: The databank of cat videos always cheers me up.
meanings.sent4: His brain was like a databank, full of facts and figures.
meanings.sent5: The databank of passwords kept all our accounts secure.
